meanings.definition: To improve the quality or value of something.
meanings.sent1: She upscales her artwork by adding vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The company upscales its products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He tried to upscale his cooking skills, but ended up burning the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile upscales the beauty of the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The new furniture upscales the living room, making it look elegant.

meanings.definition: To increase the size or scale of something.
meanings.sent1: The construction team upscales the building to add more floors.
meanings.sent2: The company upscales its production to meet the growing demand.
meanings.sent3: The balloon upscaling unexpectedly popped, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His laughter upscales the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The storm upscaling in intensity caused trees to sway violently.

meanings.definition: A higher social class or level of society.
meanings.sent1: She aspires to reach the upscales of society through hard work.
meanings.sent2: The upscales often attend exclusive events.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it's part of the upscales, lounging on the expensive rug.
meanings.sent4: The upscales of society seem like unreachable stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The mansion represents the epitome of the upscales in the neighborhood.
